text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b2f9e0e2c537bcde16dab3b62687a17e17849ce1|patch 8.2.2211: MS-Windows: can't load Python dll if not in the path>
patch 8.2.2211: MS-Windows: can't load Python dll if not in the path

Problem:    MS-Windows: can't load Python dll if not in the path.
Solution:   Use the InstallPath registry entry. (Kelvin Lee, closes #7540)

attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: can't load Python dll if not in the path. Solution: Use the InstallPath registry entry. (Kelvin Lee, closes #7540)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4aab88d919168ce2ddf4845482f4cff9efa52b5b|patch 8.2.2208: Vim9: after reloading a script variable index may be …>
patch 8.2.2208: Vim9: after reloading a script variable index may be invalid

Problem:    Vim9: after reloading a script variable index may be invalid.
Solution:   When the sequence number doesn't match give an error for using a
            script-local variable from a compiled function. (closes #7547)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/38455a921395a56690790c8c1d28c1c43ca04c8a|patch 8.2.2207: illegal memory access if popup menu items are changed>
patch 8.2.2207: illegal memory access if popup menu items are changed

Problem:    Illegal memory access if popup menu items are changed while the
            menu is visible. (Tomáš Janoušek)
Solution:   Make a copy of the text. (closes #7537)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2207: illegal memory access if popup menu items are changed · vim/vim@38455a9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2207: illegal memory access if popup menu items are changed · vim/vim@38455a9
attachments.text: Problem: Illegal memory access if popup menu items are changed while the menu is visible. (Tomáš Janoušek) Solution: Make a copy of the text. (closes #7537)

Solution:   Skip over text if more is following. (closes #7546)

Solution:   Clear growarrays.
